sentences.english: Conclusion Changkangping is an effective drug for diarrhea caused by alteration of intestinal flora.
sentences.chinese: 结论肠康平是治疗肠道菌群失调腹泻的有效制剂。

sentences.english: I admire Mr. Kohei Sugiura, a Japanese designer.
sentences.chinese: 我十分崇敬日本的设计师杉浦康平先生。

sentences.english: Harold Camping is the most recent example of such a doomsayer.
sentences.chinese: 最近的例子就是末日论者康平了。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the virus inhibitory effect of Chuan-Kang-Ping Granule.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨喘康平冲剂的抗病毒作用。
